values: Who the hell uses live journal anymore? It's the 'my space' faze of internet blogs/site profile thing. So if your reading this you probably need to get a my space account or go on my space. Live Journal is dead now but it'll come back...eventually.

Okay. Let's talk about how some people need to shut the fuck up and mind they own damn self (they don't even got they own business) AND just if y'all didn't kno i do whateva the fuck i want and whoeva gets in the way of that will have 2 deal. I hate when people try to put me in any fuckin place like i'm they child (last time i checked my dad n dem didn't give a fuck if i curse or say smart shit) so why should they? i shall update eventually...maybe...lata

Well i've been home from my trip for awhile and unpacked and all...now i'm going to pass out...lata

Oh and by the way if y'all didn't know i went to Montogomery, Tuskgee, and a few other places in Al.!...

Well it's been a second since my last update and i still have nothing to update about except i ofically have a back problem...i dunno what the fuck i did but my back is "out" as my mom said...fun! 

I can't slouch...bend foward more then a few inches OR move my arms and legs much with out feeling some odd pain and to top that off everytime i try to take a deep breath it hurts -pouts-... 

oh and 2 my pplz i dont wanna hear shit about how ---- threw my back out cuz he didn't...really y'all he didn't! 

So i'm going to try and be still and maybe try to lay down so i'll holla
Well since i don't want some people reading my livejournal im gonna make it friends only...so some of the peoplez on my friends list own't be able to read much and some wil be able to read it all

"If you read this, even if I don't speak to you often, I request you post a memory of me. It can be anything you want, so long as it happened. Then post this to your journal. See what people remember about you."

I'm bored...typical

I need to come up with a song about my life i wanna use for my music video and it has to be like 4 mins long...smh AND i need to start writing my screenplay (a breeze since it's based off of a story i wrote last year BUT i can't find whurr i put it...so yeah)-find story- ha! anyway...

Don't you hate when people are all in your pb (personal bubble) like they REALLY know you...or when they just keep talkin' knowin damn well your not listening? OMG that pisses/annoys the hell outta moi and it has been bothering me alot more lately. Hmm i guess i'm gonna have to start tellin niggas "i need two to five feet" lol
